import React from 'react'; import '../Styles/Testimonial.css' import Slider from 'react-slick'; import ava01 from '../../images/ava-1.jpg' const Testimonial = () => { const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 } return (
Testimonials

Trusted by more 5,000 customer

Had a good experience in working with their team for my needs in digital marketing services. Their staffs were professional and client relationship was good. Worth the money we spend.

Hari

CEO
); }; export default Testimonial;
